A0: Army Commander-in-Chief Gen Prayuth Chan - ocha
RelatedSentence: Army Commander-in-Chief Gen Prayuth Chan - ocha summoned chiefs of government agencies to report themselves at the Royal Army Club on Vibhavadi Rangsit Road at 9 am .
